column4: How many of you got a migraine when dealing with ubuntu for the first time
Can anyone help me figure out why my remote desktop keeps crashing
it happens when someone connects to me
kinda like gnome did without the pass
I am on Kubuntu with KDE
There where different parts to that question. It did not warrant being on one line.
it's just better to keep everything on one line so that people keep easy track of what you say.. even if they are multipart queries
now you know why we say, keep your questions together
it's a busy channel, you have to keep up with the paste, because no one is expected to remember what you said 2 minutes ago
well, suit yourself, if it gets busy, just dont expected to be treated like a king :)
have you tried running remote desktop from the command line to see what errors it spits out to the console?
you are talking about the remote desktop to windows, are you not?
err, do you use this particular "remote desktop" to connect to windows machines?
i think you need to open up more and explain the issue, because none of us here have crystal balls, comprende?
whats the _exact_ command you are typing out?
